name: Lisinopril
uses: Treat high blood pressure and heart failure

name: ACE inhibitors
uses: Lower blood pressure and reduce strain on heart

name: Epinephrine
side_effects: Increased heart rate, high blood pressure

name: Beta-blockers
uses: Reduce blood pressure and aortic stress

name: Epinephrine
uses: Immediate treatment for severe allergic reaction

name: Methotrexate
uses: Reduce inflammation and slow disease progression

name: Lisinopril
uses: Lower blood pressure and protect kidneys

name: Lactulose

name: Folic acid
